timeline.bodyText:
@romani we are checking for implied modifiers inside of records, as well; this is why I changed the documentation to say "classes and records". In this case, I didn't think that the addition of records support warranted an entirely new check.
This check is more about the missing implied modifiers than whether we are in a class or a record.
timeline.author: nmancus1

+package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.modifier.classmemberimpliedmodifier;

+ * violateImpliedStaticOnNestedInterface = true
+ * violateImpliedStaticOnNestedRecord = true

+    // Implied modifier 'static' should be explicit. [ClassMemberImpliedModifier]

+
+    public static record GoodRecord() {} // OK
